attributes.action: Identify carefully then Address the root cause of patients health complaint
attributes.additional_details:
Thousands of people die needlessly in the UK from preventable causes. I became very ill in 2016. Doctors endorsed no Functional Medicine program, instead simply prescribed pills after pills. However, I was able to improve my health by designing my own FMP.
Over 22% of the deaths that occurred in 2019 could have been avoided through preventative measures.  https://www.ons.gov.uk/peoplepopulationandcommunity/healthandsocialcare/causesofdeath/bulletins/avoidablemortalityinenglandandwales/2019
In addition to saving lives, applying preventative measures will save NHS money. Investing in public health interventions like clinics; changing lifestyle are highly cost-effective measures.
https://academic.oup.com/jpubhealth/article/34/1/37/1554654
attributes.background:
1) Classes in Nutrition, Exercise & Breathing
2) Patients to pass thru' a Triage b4 seeing GP & direct them to: Go, Sleep, Breathe Clinics accordingly before medicating
4) Start a Wellness Program - offer rebates to those who are responsible for weight loss, lower cholesterol, manage blood sugar

rejection.details:
Decisions relating to how patients' medical needs are assessed and treated are clinical matters for the National Health Service (NHS), not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could have a petition calling on the Government to fund the NHS to run classes on nutrition and exercise, if that is something you'd like to see happen.
